DOC.brief_summary: A retrospective multicenter investigation use da Vinci® Surgical System Non-Tumor Based TORS Procedures . The study objective evaluate safety effectiveness da Vinci Surgical System subject undergoing Benign Non-tumor procedure .
DOC.brief_title: A Retrospective Multicenter Investigation Use da Vinci® Surgical System Non-Tumor Based TORS Procedures
DOC.detailed_description: Primary Effectiveness Endpoint : • Ability complete procedure without need conversion non-robotic approach Safety Endpoint : Assessment adverse event post-operative follow-up include limited : • Bleeding ▪ Mortality Additional endpoint evaluate may include : - Procedure time - Length hospital stay - Volume tissue resect - Use tissue sealant
DOC.criteria: The specific surgical procedure involve lingual tonsillectomy , tongue base resection , partial glossectomy procedure . Subject ≥18 year age time procedure Subject underwent benign nontumor TORS procedure involve either lingual tonsillectomy , tongue base resection partial glossectomy . Subject underwent TORS procedure oropharyngeal cancer
